page.title: 04The Vicar of Bicknoller
page.content: The{Vicar of Bicknoller}goes around visiting poeple to see how they are getting on. Sometimes he arranges meetings for people. To become a Vicar you have to study the Bible a lot.He likes his work and belives in God's help.Mr Woodland has got 1,200 poeple in his three parishes which are in Bicknoller.Sampford Brett and Crowcombe.He lives in Bicknoller.The vicar said how much he likes the statues and the stained glass windows in all three chuches. On{Sundays}Rev Woodland arranges services for his three parishes. During the week he conducts weddinss and funerals. He visits{Crowcombe School}on Thursdays and also tries to have a rest.His favourite prayer is the prayer of St. Francis of Assissi.
